name: symlink
title: Symlink
description: A simple Raycast extension for creating symbolic links.
author: cymaera

commands.name: create-symlink
commands.title: Create Symlink
commands.subtitle: Create symlinks for selected files.
commands.description: Create symlinks for files selected in Finder.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
